item.title: 消息人士称欧佩克+原则上同意再次大幅提高石油产量
item.description: 欧佩克+组织的两位消息人士周日称，欧佩克+组织原则上同意将9月份的石油日产量提高54.8万桶，因为该组织即将完成其最大一批减产计划，人们担心俄罗斯会进一步中断供应。【原文：OPEC+ agreed in principle to boost oil output by 548,000 barrels per day in September, two OPEC+ sources said on Sunday as the group finishes unwinding its biggest tranche of production cuts amid fears of further supply disruptions from Russia.】

item.title: 巴西 BRF 小股东支持 Marfrig 交易
item.description: 据周六的一份证券文件显示，巴西家禽和猪肉加工商 BRF 的多数小股东已经批准了与牛肉加工商 Marfrig 的合作建议。【原文：The majority of minority shareholders of Brazilian poultry and pork processor BRF have approved a proposed tie-up with beefpacker Marfrig , according to a securities filing on Saturday.】

item.title: 智利 Codelco 公司向被困 El Teniente 矿工伸出援手
item.description: 智利铜矿商 Codelco 周六表示，该公司已清理了超过五分之一被堵塞的地下通道，以便与旗舰矿山 El Teniente 的被困工人取得联系，但尚未与他们取得联系。【原文：Chilean copper miner Codelco said on Saturday it has cleared just over a fifth of the blocked underground tunnels needed to reach trapped workers at its flagship El Teniente mine, but has not yet made contact with them.】

item.title: 巴西 Azul 公司获得 6.5 亿美元投资承诺
item.description: 巴西 Azul 航空公司周五晚些时候提交的一份证券文件显示，该公司与某些利益相关方签署了一项协议，将在未来的资本化交易中投资 6.5 亿美元。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul said it signed an agreement with certain stakeholders for a $650 million investment in a future capitalization deal, according to a late Friday securities filing.】

item.title: 特朗普关税打击伯克希尔消费品业务
item.description: 伯克希尔哈撒韦公司拥有 Fruit of the Loom、Jazwares 和 Brooks Sports。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway owns Fruit of the Loom, Jazwares and Brooks Sports.】

item.title: 伯克希尔对卡夫亨氏进行减记，营业利润下降
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周六减记了对卡夫亨氏公司（Kraft Heinz）的部分投资，并报告称，由于保险承销保费下降，第二季度营业利润下降了 4%。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway on Saturday wrote down part of its investment in Kraft Heinz , and reported a 4% decline in second-quarter operating profit as premiums from insurance underwriting fell.】

item.title: 纽约时报》报道：尽管特朗普发出威胁，印度仍将购买俄罗斯石油
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周六报道，印度官员表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要实施惩罚，但他们仍将继续从俄罗斯购买石油。【原文：Indian officials have said they would keep purchasing oil from Russia despite the threat of penalties that U.S. President Donald Trump said he would impose, the New York Times reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 起亚美国召回201,149辆Telluride汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周六表示，起亚美国公司已在美国召回约201,149辆Telluride汽车，原因是车门皮带成型饰条可能会脱层并从车辆上脱落。【原文：Kia America has recalled about 201,149 Telluride vehicles in the U.S. as the door belt molding trim can delaminate and detach from the vehicle, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Saturday.】

item.title: 致命碰撞事故发生后，美国联邦航空局计划更改更多直升机航线
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周五表示，在 1 月 29 日一架美国航空公司支线喷气机与一架陆军直升机在空中相撞造成 67 人死亡后，该局正计划在罗纳德-里根华盛顿国家机场附近对直升机航线进行更多的调整。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said on Friday it is planning additional helicopter route changes near Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport after the January 29 mid-air collision of an American Airlines regional jet and an Army helicopter that killed 67 people.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司必须面对儿童色情视频的部分诉讼
item.description: 联邦上诉法院周五恢复了指控埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司成为剥削儿童避风港的部分诉讼，但法院表示，该平台应享有广泛的豁免权，免受对不良内容的索赔。【原文：A federal appeals court on Friday revived part of a lawsuit accusing Elon Musk's X of becoming a haven for child exploitation, though the court said the platform deserves broad immunity from claims over objectionable content.】

item.title: 惠誉将 Pemex 的信用评级上调至 "BB"，理由是政府提供了更有力的支持
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）在一份声明中称，该公司周二将墨西哥国家能源生产商墨西哥石油公司（Pemex）的信用评级从 "B+"上调至 "BB"，取消了其积极观察评级，并称政府支持力度有所加强。【原文：Fitch Ratings upgraded Mexican state energy producer Petroleos Mexicanos' (Pemex) credit rating to 'BB' from 'B+' on Tuesday, removing its positive watch status and citing strengthened government support, the agency said in a statement.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，Mistral 正在与风险投资公司谈判，MGX 将以 100 亿美元的估值筹集资金
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五援引知情人士的话报道，法国人工智能初创公司 Mistral 正在与投资者、风险投资公司和阿布扎比的 MGX 公司洽谈，希望以 100 亿美元的估值融资 10 亿美元。【原文：French artificial intelligence startup Mistral is in talks with investors, venture capital firms and Abu Dhabi's MGX to raise $1 billion at a valuation of $10 billion, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沃尔玛墨西哥首席执行官伊格纳西奥-卡里德卸任
item.description: 沃尔玛墨西哥和中美洲分部首席执行官伊格纳西奥-卡里德（Ignacio Caride）周五发表声明称，他将从董事会卸任，立即生效。【原文：The chief executive officer of Walmart's Mexico and Central America unit, Ignacio Caride, is stepping down from his role and from the board of directors effective immediately, the company said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: Meta 将通过出售 20 亿美元资产分担人工智能基础设施成本
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司正加紧引进外部合作伙伴，帮助为人工智能所需的大规模基础设施提供资金，并在周四提交的一份文件中披露，作为该战略的一部分，该公司计划卸载 20 亿美元的数据中心资产。【原文：Meta Platforms is pressing ahead with efforts to bring in outside partners to help fund the massive infrastructure needed to power artificial intelligence, disclosing plans in a filing on Thursday to offload $2 billion in data center assets as part of that strategy.】

item.title: 贝森特称美国已与中国 "达成协议
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周五表示，他相信华盛顿已具备与中国达成协议的条件，并对未来的道路表示 "乐观"。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Friday that he believed that Washington has the makings of a deal with China and that he was "optimistic" about the path forward.】

item.title: 交易日，这是一次现实的检验
item.description: - 交易日【原文：- TRADING DAY】

item.title: 美国国防法案建议审查苹果显示器供应商
item.description: 最近几周，美国国防开支法案中增加了一项措施，如果获得通过，将要求五角大楼确定苹果公司的一家显示器供应商是否应被列为中国军工企业。【原文：A measure added into a massive U.S. defense spending bill in recent weeks will, if passed, ask the Pentagon to determine whether one of Apple's display suppliers should be listed as a Chinese military company.】

item.title: 美国证券监管机构宣布成立人工智能工作组
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）周五表示，它正在创建一个人工智能工作组，领导该机构努力 "加强创新和提高效率"。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said on Friday that it is creating an artificial intelligence task force to lead the agency's efforts to "enhance innovation and efficiency" in its operations.】

item.title: VIEW 投资者对库格勒辞职和BLS专员被解雇的反应
item.description: 美联储周五表示，行长阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）将从 8 月 8 日起辞去央行职务。【原文：The Federal Reserve said on Friday that Governor Adriana Kugler was resigning from the central bank effective Aug. 8.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒将于 8 月 8 日辞职
item.description: 美联储周五表示，美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒将提前辞去任期，并于8月8日退出央行，在与总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关系不佳的情况下，这可能会动摇本已纷争不断的美联储领导层继任进程。【原文：The Federal Reserve said Friday that Governor Adriana Kugler is resigning early from her term and will exit the central bank on Aug. 8, potentially shaking up what was already a fractious succession process for Fed leadership amid difficult relations with President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 特斯拉被佛罗里达州陪审团勒令在自动驾驶车祸中赔偿 3.29 亿美元
item.description: 周五，佛罗里达州的一个陪审团认定，特斯拉在2019年一辆配备自动驾驶功能的Model S发生的致命车祸中负有责任，并责令埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的汽车制造商向一名死亡妇女的家属和一名受伤幸存者支付3.29亿美元。【原文：A Florida jury on Friday found Tesla liable in the 2019 fatal crash of an Autopilot-equipped Model S, and ordered Elon Musk's automaker to pay $329 million to the family of a deceased woman and an injured survivor.】

item.title: X 称英国网络安全法危及言论自由
item.description: 社交媒体网站 X 周五表示，英国的网络安全法由于执行力度过大，有压制言论自由的风险，并补充说需要进行重大改革。【原文：Britain's online safety law risks suppressing free speech due to its heavy-handed enforcement, social media site X said on Friday, adding that significant changes were needed.】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，特斯拉被认定对 2019 年致命车祸负有部分责任
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周五报道，陪审团认定特斯拉对 2019 年在佛罗里达州基拉戈发生的一起涉及驾驶辅助技术的致命车祸负有部分责任，并向该公司提出了 2 亿美元的惩罚性赔偿。【原文：A jury found Tesla partially liable for a fatal 2019 crash involving driver-assistance technology in Key Largo, Florida, and slapped the company with $200 million in punitive damages, the Washington Post reported on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普称美联储鲍威尔应被 "放逐
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，联邦反垄断委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔应该被 "赶出牧场"。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday that Federal Reverse Chairman Jerome Powell should be "put out to pasture."】

item.title: 据《竞技体育》报道，美国橄榄球联盟（NFL）将红区（Red Zone）和 NFL 媒体资产以十亿美元的价格协议转让给 ESPN
item.description: 据《竞技体育》（The Athletic）周五报道，美国橄榄球联盟（NFL）与迪斯尼旗下的 ESPN 达成了一项可能价值数十亿美元的协议，将联盟的许多媒体控股权交给体育网络，以换取 ESPN 的股权。【原文：The NFL and Disney's ESPN have reached a deal, potentially worth billions, placing many of the league's media holdings with the sports network in exchange for equity in ESPN, the Athletic reported on Friday.】

item.title: Blackstone 将在枪击一周后重新开设纽约办事处
item.description: Blackstone 周五告诉员工，公司将于 8 月 4 日重新开放纽约总部，一周前，纽约发生枪击案，造成四人死亡，其中包括一名公司高管。【原文：Blackstone told employees on Friday it will reopen its New York headquarters on August 4, a week after shuttering it in the wake of a shooting that killed four people including one of its executives.】

item.title: 美国非农就业数据修正令市场大跌眼镜，美联储看起来落后了
item.description: 上个月美国劳动力市场意外疲软的消息周五令投资者感到震惊，因为对过去几个月的大幅修正使人们担心美联储最近几个月可能一直在盲目扩张，可能需要在降息方面迎头赶上。【原文：News of a surprise weakening in the U.S. labor market last month jolted investors on Friday, as hefty revisions to past months raised fears the Federal Reserve may have been flying blind in recent months and may need to play catch-up with interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 卡尼顾问称，加拿大贸易团队可能在特朗普加征关税后退出特区谈判
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）的一位顾问周五表示，在美国决定对来自加拿大的部分商品征收35%的关税后，加拿大负责与美国达成贸易协议的团队可能会退出谈判。【原文：The Canadian team working on a trade deal with the United States could walk away from talks in the wake of a U.S. decision to impose a 35% tariff on some goods from Canada, an adviser to Prime Minister Mark Carney said on Friday.】

item.title: 达美航空不会使用人工智能制定个性化机票价格
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）周五表示，在面临美国立法者的尖锐批评后，该公司将不会使用人工智能为乘客设定个性化机票价格。【原文：Delta Air Lines said Friday it will not use artificial intelligence to set personalized ticket prices for passengers after facing sharp criticism from U.S. lawmakers.】

item.title: 贸易组织警告说，特朗普的 "美国优先 "生物柴油政策可能使美国公司和消费者蒙受损失
item.description: 据一些炼油和生物燃料贸易团体称，特朗普政府不鼓励在国内生物柴油中使用外国原料的做法可能会导致美国消费者的能源价格上涨，并限制国内生产。【原文：The Trump administration's push to discourage the use of foreign feedstocks in domestic biodiesel could lead to higher energy prices for U.S. consumers and restricted domestic production, according to some refining and biofuel trade groups.】
